content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully built on the map. Although the agent repeatedly attempted to craft and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, all attempts failed due to missing items and resource shortages. The agent did reference two furnaces used for smelting operations—an alternative furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron plate production and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate production—but these were retrieved as pre‐existing utilities rather than newly created structures.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities Usage Errors
  – When retrieving entities, use the correct function signature. Do not supply unsupported keyword arguments (for example, avoid using “radius” if not accepted) or extra positional parameters.

• Iteration on Entity Results
  – Always verify that the result from an entity retrieval call is not None before iterating over it to avoid TypeErrors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures
  – Confirm that the lab item is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuit components synthesized from copper-cables and copper-plates) are available prior to initiating Lab crafting.
  – Reinforce resource acquisition and smelting procedures to meet the complete chain of dependencies needed for Lab production.
